name: EmailSalesOrderToCustomer
description:
Email a sales order to a customer.

Send an email containing the sales order to the customer, with optional custom content. If no content is provided, the default email content will be used.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the organization for which the sales order is being emailed.

parameters.name: sales_order_id
parameters.description: Provide the unique identifier of the sales order to be emailed to the customer.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the sales order.

parameters.name: sales_order_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the sales order to be emailed.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the sales order.

parameters.name: sales_order_attachments
parameters.description: A list of file paths or URLs for attachments to include with the sales order email.

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the file to be attached to the email.

parameters.name: email_request_body
parameters.description: JSON string containing email details such as from address, recipients, subject, and body for the sales order email.

from_address_id.description: From Address of the Email Address

send_from_org_email_id.description: Boolean to trigger the email from the organization's email address.

to_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients.

cc_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients to be CC ed.

bcc_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients to be BCC ed.

parameters.name: include_sales_order_attachment
parameters.description: Specify true to include the sales order attachment in the email, or false to exclude it.

value_schema.description: Send the sales order attachment a with the email.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the zoho-books API.

parameters.name: send_attachment
parameters.description: Send the sales order attachment a with the email.

value_schema.description: Send the sales order attachment a with the email.

parameters.description: Unique identifier of the sales order.
